main event: A witness observed one big orange object resembling flames in Dallas, Texas, which moved at a terrific speed, reportedly 3 to 4 times faster than an aircraft.
interesting points: The object was first thought to be a police vehicle but then revealed a different nature, The observation lasted approximately 5 seconds, The object faded and disappeared after the initial sighting, It was reported by a civilian source, The object was concluded to be astronomical in nature, specifically a meteor.
sighted object: one big orange object resembling flames
